name: Automate TikTok Video Transcription with RapidAPI and Google Sheets
description:
# TikTok Transcript Generator
## Overview
This automated workflow extracts transcripts from TikTok videos by reading video URLs from a Google Sheet, calling the **API via [TikTok Transcript Generator](https://rapidapi.com/PrineshPatel/api/tiktok-transcript-generator)**, cleaning the subtitle data, and updating the sheet with transcripts. It efficiently handles batches, errors, and rate limits to provide a seamless transcription process.

## Key Features
- **Batch processing:** Reads and processes multiple TikTok video URLs from Google Sheets.
- **Automatic transcript generation:** Uses the **[TikTok Transcript Generator API on RapidAPI](https://rapidapi.com/PrineshPatel/api/tiktok-transcript-generator)**.
- **Clean subtitle output:** Removes timestamps and headers for clear transcripts.
- **Error handling:** Marks videos with no available transcript.
- **Rate limiting:** Implements wait times to avoid API throttling on **[RapidAPI](https://rapidapi.com/PrineshPatel/api/tiktok-transcript-generator)**.
- **Seamless Google Sheets integration:** Updates the same sheet with transcript results and statuses.

## API Used
- **[TikTok Transcript Generator API](https://rapidapi.com/PrineshPatel/api/tiktok-transcript-generator)**  
 
## Google Sheet Columns
| Column Name    | Description                              |
|----------------|-----------------------------------------|
| Video Url      | URL of the TikTok video to transcribe   |
| Transcript     | Generated transcript text (updated by workflow) |
| Generated Date | Date when the transcript was generated (YYYY-MM-DD) |

## Workflow Nodes Explanation

| Node Name                | Type                  | Purpose                                                           |
|--------------------------|-----------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------|
| When clicking ‚ÄòExecute workflow‚Äô | Manual Trigger        | Manually starts the entire transcription workflow.               |
| Google Sheets2           | Google Sheets (Read)  | Reads TikTok video URLs and transcript data from Google Sheets.  |
| Loop Over Items          | Split In Batches      | Processes rows in smaller batches to control execution speed.     |
| If                       | Conditional Check     | Filters videos needing transcription (URL present, transcript empty). |
| HTTP Request             | HTTP Request          | Calls the **TikTok Transcript Generator API on [RapidAPI](https://rapidapi.com/PrineshPatel/api/tiktok-transcript-generator)** to fetch transcripts.  |
| If1                      | Conditional Check     | Checks for valid API responses (handles 404 errors).              |
| Code                     | Code (JavaScript)     | Cleans and formats raw subtitle text by removing timestamps.     |
| Google Sheets             | Google Sheets (Update)| Updates the sheet with cleaned transcripts and generation dates. |
| Google Sheets1            | Google Sheets (Update)| Updates sheet with ‚ÄúNo transcription available‚Äù message on error.|
| Wait                     | Wait                  | Adds delay between batches to avoid API rate limits on **[RapidAPI](https://rapidapi.com/PrineshPatel/api/tiktok-transcript-generator)**.              |

## Challenges Resolved
- **Manual Transcription Effort:** Eliminates the need to manually transcribe TikTok videos, saving time and reducing errors.
- **API Rate Limits:** Introduces batching and wait periods to avoid exceeding API usage limits on **[RapidAPI](https://rapidapi.com/PrineshPatel/api/tiktok-transcript-generator)**, ensuring smooth execution.
- **Incomplete or Missing Data:** Filters out videos already transcribed and handles missing transcripts gracefully by logging appropriate messages.
- **Data Formatting Issues:** Cleans raw subtitle data to provide readable, timestamp-free transcripts.
- **Data Synchronization:** Updates transcripts back into the same Google Sheet row, maintaining data consistency and ease of access.

## Use Cases
- Content creators wanting to transcribe TikTok videos automatically.
- Social media analysts extracting text data for research.
- Automation enthusiasts integrating transcript generation into workflows.

## How to Use
1. Prepare a Google Sheet with the columns: **Video Url**, **Transcript**, and **Generated Date**.
2. Connect your Google Sheets account in the workflow.
3. Enter your **RapidAPI** key for the TikTok Transcript Generator API.
4. Execute the workflow to generate transcripts.
5. View transcripts and generated dates directly in your Google Sheet.

---

**Try this workflow to automate your TikTok video transcriptions efficiently!**

Create your **free n8n account** and set up the workflow in just a few minutes using the link below:

üëâ [Start Automating with n8n](https://n8n.partnerlinks.io/7fuarh1e6dz5)

Save time, stay consistent, and grow your LinkedIn presence effortlessly!

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.

data.details: The Code node allows you to execute JavaScript in your workflow.

parameters.content:
# üìù TikTok Transcript Extraction & Logging Workflow

This n8n workflow automatically fetches TikTok video transcripts via the RapidAPI TikTok Transcript Generator and updates a Google Sheet with cleaned transcriptions. It processes only rows missing transcripts, handles errors, and adds timestamps.

---

## üß© Node-by-Node Explanation
1. **Manual Trigger** ‚Äì Starts the workflow manually on demand.  
2. **Google Sheets2** ‚Äì Reads TikTok video URLs and existing transcripts from the sheet.  
3. **Loop Over Items** ‚Äì Processes rows in batches of 10 for rate limiting.  
4. **If** ‚Äì Checks if a video URL exists and transcript is missing.  
5. **HTTP Request** ‚Äì Calls TikTok transcript API to fetch subtitles.  
6. **If1** ‚Äì Verifies the API response is successful (no 404 error).  
7. **Code** ‚Äì Cleans raw subtitles by removing timestamps and headers.  
8. **Google Sheets** ‚Äì Updates the sheet with cleaned transcript and date.  
9. **Google Sheets1** ‚Äì Marks videos with no transcript available in the sheet.  
10. **Wait** ‚Äì Pauses workflow to manage API rate limits before next batch.  

---

## üîë Summary Use Cases  
- Automate generation of TikTok video transcripts for content teams.  
- Maintain a centralized Google Sheet of transcripts for SEO, captions, or repurposing content.  
- Reduce manual effort and errors in transcribing TikTok videos.  
- Handle API errors and missing data gracefully.

---

**This workflow enables seamless, automated transcription fetching and management for TikTok videos via Google Sheets integration, ideal for marketing, social media managers, and content creators.**

### 1. When clicking ‚ÄòExecute workflow‚Äô  
**Type:** Manual Trigger  
**Purpose:**  
Manually triggers the workflow to start the process of reading TikTok URLs and generating transcripts.  
**Use Case:**  
Initiate the entire flow on demand without waiting for scheduled triggers.

### 2. Google Sheets2  
**Type:** Google Sheets (Read)  
**Purpose:**  
Reads rows from the specified Google Sheet containing TikTok video URLs and existing transcript data.  
**Use Case:**  
Fetch the list of videos to process and identify which ones need transcription.

### 3. Loop Over Items  
**Type:** Split In Batches  
**Purpose:**  
Processes the fetched rows in smaller batches (default 10 items per batch) to avoid rate limits or overload.  
**Use Case:**  
Control the workflow execution speed and resource usage when handling large data sets.

### 4. If  
**Type:** Conditional Check (If)  
**Purpose:**  
Filters each row to process only those where the `Video Url` is not empty and `Transcript` is empty (i.e., videos needing transcription).  
**Use Case:**  
Skip rows already having transcripts to avoid redundant API calls.

### 5. HTTP Request  
**Type:** HTTP Request  
**Purpose:**  
Calls the TikTok Transcript Generator API with the video URL to retrieve the transcript.  
**Use Case:**  
Get the subtitle/transcript data for TikTok videos programmatically.

### 6. If  
**Type:** Conditional Check (If)  
**Purpose:**  
Checks if the API response is valid and does not contain a 404 error.  
**Use Case:**  
Handle cases where transcripts are unavailable or the video URL is invalid.

### 7. Code  
**Type:** Code (JavaScript)  
**Purpose:**  
Cleans the raw subtitles returned by the API by removing headers, timestamps, and empty lines for better readability.  
**Use Case:**  
Prepare the transcript text for clean storage and further processing.

### 8. Google Sheets  
**Type:** Google Sheets (Append or Update)  
**Purpose:**  
Writes the cleaned transcript, video URL, and generation date back into the Google Sheet, updating existing rows.  
**Use Case:**  
Maintain an up-to-date record of transcripts next to each TikTok video URL.

### 9. Google Sheets1  
**Type:** Google Sheets (Append or Update)  
**Purpose:**  
For cases where the API returns an error (like 404), it updates the sheet with a "No transcription available" message for that video URL.  
**Use Case:**  
Clearly indicate videos for which transcripts could not be generated.

### 10. Wait  
**Type:** Wait  
**Purpose:**  
Pauses the workflow briefly between batches to prevent hitting API rate limits and ensure smooth execution.  
**Use Case:**  
Throttle the flow execution for stability and API compliance.
